Simplessssss 2016-08-16T17:08:29-05:00 http://simplessssss.com/ Simplessssss i@simplessssss.com 猛犸象国家公园 2016-06-12T00:00:00-05:00 http://simplessssss.com/%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%B8%B8/2016/06/12/mamothcave <p>在总计超过5miles的hiking中结束了猛犸象国家公园的游玩。<br /> 猛犸象公园有大约200年的历史，总计405miles(2015.7)，1941年成为国家公园。<br /> 第一次国家公园的游玩，整体感觉非常棒。总结一下行程（特别是与国内的不同）：<br /> 1. 国家公园的景点非常的平价<br /> 2. 自然资源的保护非常的棒<br /> 3. 景区内无胡乱定价的商品</p> <p>第一天，尝试了3个tour，分别是1个easy难度的和2个medium的。easy的是Domes and Dripstones, medium难度的分别是Gothic Avenue Tour和Historic的。<br /> Domes and Dripstones<br /> -<img src="/assets/image/mc-1.JPG" alt="bride-hall" /><br /> -<img src="/assets/image/mc-2.JPG" alt="names" /><br /> -<img src="/assets/image/mc-3.JPG" alt="stones" /><br /> Gothic Avenue Tour和Historic更多的是旅行，旅行过程中的美并不是照片所能拍到的。<br /> -<img src="/assets/image/mc-4.JPG" alt="holes" /><br /> -<img src="/assets/image/mc-5.JPG" alt="stones" /><br /> -<img src="/assets/image/mc-6.JPG" alt="fall" /></p> <p>第二天，来了个difficult的introduction to caving. 穿上了整齐的caving套装（经典提供 :) ）, 历时3个小时的caving，各种climbing，各种crawling。感叹于历史， 感叹于地下的魅力。 安全起见，没有任何照片。<br /> 由于结束的早，几个小伙伴沿着国家公园进行了一次5miles的hiking，就此旅行结束。<br /> -<img src="/assets/image/mc-hk1.JPG" alt="hike1" /><br /> -<img src="/assets/image/mc-hk2.JPG" alt="hike2" /><br /> -<img src="/assets/image/mc-hk3.JPG" alt="hike3" /></p> <p>-最后，小妞妞今天去了gg的campus，放一张照片留作纪念as well。<br /> –<img src="/assets/image/gg-1.JPG" alt="gg" /></p> 纽约行(2) 2016-06-08T00:00:00-05:00 http://simplessssss.com/2016/06/08/ny2 纽约行(1) 2016-06-04T00:00:00-05:00 http://simplessssss.com/%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%B8%B8/2016/06/04/ny1 <p>第一天的纽约行终于结束了，怎一个累字了得！！！！！<br /> 先是yangyang兄弟镇楼吧。<br /> -<img src="/assets/image/ny-1.7.JPG" alt="bro" /><br /> 由于black car service的不给力，第一天晚上吭哧吭哧的到了1点多才抵达宾馆。||| (价格高，服务差，3个mile，收了94刀)<br /> 早上决定8点左右起床，重度拖延症的我拖到了8.45起床，洗漱下楼吃早饭。(图盗自yangyang，我才不要吃bagel啊！！)<br /> -<img src="/assets/image/ny-1.1.JPG" alt="Breakfast" /><br /> 吃完早饭，洗了个澡，匆匆忙忙中开始了第一天的旅行。首先决定去中央公园与超哥汇合(敲诈的好时机，怎么可以错过)，第一次乘坐ny的地铁，买了30块的metro card，<br /> 地铁站那叫一个老，似乎是中世纪的产物？ 大概45钟之后抵达时代广场！ 旅行开始!! <br /> -<img src="/assets/image/ny-1.2.JPG" alt="m&amp;m" /><br /> -<img src="/assets/image/ny-1.3.JPG" alt="ts" /><br /> 中午1点10分终于成功与超哥汇合(晚点一个多小时)，一起去吃了一顿不错的中餐料理。(当然全部由超哥买单啦)<br /> -<img src="/assets/image/ny-1.5.JPG" alt="lunch" /><br /> 匆忙吃过午饭，已经3点，和yangyang直奔大都会博物馆。<br /> -<img src="/assets/image/ny-1.6.JPG" alt="metropolitan" /><br /> 镇宝之馆！！镇管之宝:）<br /> -<img src="/assets/image/ny-1.8.JPG" alt="metropolitan" /><br /> 在大都会博物馆走马观花了3个半小时之后去了一下中央公园，决定去帝国大厦看美景。<br /> -<img src="/assets/image/ny-1.9.JPG" alt="metropolitan" /><br /> -<img src="/assets/image/ny-1.10.JPG" alt="metropolitan" /><br /> 至此，第一天旅程匆匆结束，回到宾馆已尽10点半左右。 不得不提一下uber小哥，开始我将搞错地址，中途不仅二话不说更改地址，更是将我们安全送达目的地，并且没有多收一分钱，十分的感动啊。</p> Compilers 2016-05-19T00:00:00-05:00 趁着还有4个月的时间，帮着王老师多干一点实验室活之余，也准备学一点想要深入学习，却没有时间去干的一些东西（当然最主要是码点字</td> <td> </td> <td> </td> <td>, 让我这个死（zha）宅（zha）学会表达自己）。第一个当然是complier了，从入学西电，一直到从孟菲斯毕业，大部分时间都在和C/C++(compiler)打交道，却一直没有深入的去理解他们，赶着这个档期，赶紧补完coursera上的compiler课程（课程长度是10周，汗）。</td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <ol> <li></li> </ol> 330. Patching Array 2016-02-19T00:00:00-06:00 http://simplessssss.com/leetcode/2016/02/19/330-patching-array <p>We keep what numbers are missing, the first 1 is one.<br /> Then if there exists a number in the array which is smaller than missing, we can add to result and make the next missing number<br /> to be nums[idx] + missing<br /> If there is no such number in the array that nums[idx] &lt;= missing, then we can add missing to the array.</p> <div class="highlight"><pre><code class="language-cpp" data-lang="cpp"><span class="k">class</span> <span class="nc">Solution</span> <span class="p">{</span> <span class="k">public</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">minPatches</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">vector</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="kt">int</span><span class="o">&gt;&amp;</span> <span class="n">nums</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">n</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">ans</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">idx</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="kt">long</span> <span class="kt">long</span> <span class="n">total</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="kt">long</span> <span class="kt">long</span> <span class="n">nn</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">long</span> <span class="kt">long</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="k">while</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">total</span> <span class="o">&lt;=</span> <span class="n">n</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">idx</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="n">nums</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">size</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="n">nums</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">&lt;=</span> <span class="n">total</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span> <span class="n">total</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="n">nums</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">idx</span><span class="o">++</span><span class="p">];</span> <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="p">{</span> <span class="n">total</span> <span class="o">&lt;&lt;=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">ans</span><span class="o">++</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="p">}</span> <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">ans</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="p">}</span> <span class="p">};</span></code></pre></div>
